title: Liptauer Käse (Austria)Hungarian Cheese Spread (Liptauer)
directions: Mix the farmer's cheese with the onion, anchovies, capers, caraway seeds and paprika.
Serve on pumpernickel or rye bread.
Place into a bowl or pretty mold covered with plastic wrap. Cover top of cheese with plastic wrap.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours overnight is best.
Unmold on to a serving plate and surround with rye bread squares, fresh veggies, or crackers.
ingredients: 8 ounces smooth farmer's cheese, room temperature
1 tablespoon anchovy paste or 1 tablespoon finely chopped anchovy
